<NEW>

For the moment, witnessing the seeming altercation of agg=
ression circuits between LEO PRIME and TUSCON PRIME as DINOBOT went out of =
the tunnel, flanking over towards SKY SHADOW with a look of..  AMUSEMENT up=
on his faceplate, but remaining in silence.

Staying on inter-Predacon radi=
o, which hopefully at close range would work then, and not be audible to th=
e MAXIMALS, and sending a signal to CRYOTEK.  <We seem to be restrained dow=
n here for now.  What are your orders then?  Press on or attempt to instiga=
te altercations within the MAXIMALS?>

The aerial Predacons up aboveground =
seemed to be cut off from them for now, who had not followed them undergrou=
nd (such as WASPINATOAR and BLACKARACHNIA).

DRILL BIT had dug back undergr=
ound once his bait had been laid, digging underneath.  VICE GRIP remained a=
